Uses of Interface
org.jboss.netty.buffer.ChannelBufferIndexFinder

Packages that use ChannelBufferIndexFinder
org.jboss.netty.buffer Abstraction of a byte buffer - the fundamental data structure to represent a low-level binary and text message. 
 

Uses of ChannelBufferIndexFinder in org.jboss.netty.buffer

          Index finder which locates a CR ('\r') byte.
static ChannelBufferIndexFinder ChannelBufferIndexFinder.CRLF
          Index finder which locates a CR ('\r') or LF ('\n').
static ChannelBufferIndexFinder ChannelBufferIndexFinder.LF
          Index finder which locates a LF ('\n') byte.
static ChannelBufferIndexFinder ChannelBufferIndexFinder.LINEAR_WHITESPACE
          Index finder which locates a linear whitespace (' ' and '\t').
static ChannelBufferIndexFinder ChannelBufferIndexFinder.NOT_CR
          Index finder which locates a non-CR ('\r') byte.
static ChannelBufferIndexFinder ChannelBufferIndexFinder.NOT_CRLF
          Index finder which locates a byte which is neither a CR ('\r') nor a LF ('\n').
static ChannelBufferIndexFinder ChannelBufferIndexFinder.NOT_LF
          Index finder which locates a non-LF ('\n') byte.
static ChannelBufferIndexFinder ChannelBufferIndexFinder.NOT_LINEAR_WHITESPACE
          Index finder which locates a byte which is not a linear whitespace (neither ' ' nor '\t').
static ChannelBufferIndexFinder ChannelBufferIndexFinder.NOT_NUL
          Index finder which locates a non-NUL (0x00) byte.
static ChannelBufferIndexFinder ChannelBufferIndexFinder.NUL
          Index finder which locates a NUL (0x00) byte.
